version_description:
This version gives accounts access to the following features:

• Forgot Username/Password
• Change password
• Pre-authorized payment set-up
• View plan details and total account(s) balance
• Change voicemail password
• Nickname creation for accounts

Now, you can manage your family’s data worry-free, for each line on your Share Everything™ plan.
Various bug fixes
Small Business customers can now link their Wireless accounts through the MyRogers app.
We’ve added Notifications and a Message Centre so you can stay on top of your account, promotions, and events.

We’ve added Notifications and a Message Centre so you can stay on top of your account, promotions, and events.

Minor bug fixes and improvements.
Only Rogers lets you stream up to 3x more video with your data using Stream Saver™

Only Rogers lets you stream up to 3x more video with your data using Stream Saver ™

General performance improvements and bug fixes
General performance improvements and bug fixes

A simplified refreshed design
Improved performance for ease of use
View a newly designed, easy to read and navigate bill
Touch ID Support / Face ID Support

Small updates, huge difference. Our latest version is all about bug fixes that make your everyday a little bit easier. Plus, if you’re an Ignite TV customer, congrats. We’ve tailored the app to go with your tailored TV experience, including a detailed view of the flex channels currently available to you. Update today and manage your account, worry-free.
In this latest version we’ve added a link to our terms and conditions section for easier access to our privacy policy and the assurance that your data will always be protected.
In this latest version we’ve added a link to our terms and conditions section for easier access to our privacy policy and the assurance that your data will always be protected.
In this latest version we’ve made improvements to some bugs making things more reliable and stable than ever before. Say goodbye to the unexpected and hello to an overall better app experience!

In this latest version improvements continue with usability enhancements, new visually appealing design elements, bug fixes and more. With better access to your internet usage details, this app just got an enjoyment overhaul!

In this latest version we’ve made things easier for everyone including the visually impaired by adding new accessibility elements to help with things like making payments and more. Plus, it’s now easier for Ignite TV users to keep track of all their internet and TV equipment. With login improvements, better password change options, continual bug fixes and a faster way to pay your bill with fewer steps, now you’re one step closer to the things that matter most!

In this latest version we’ve made things easier for everyone including the visually impaired by adding new accessibility elements to help with things like making payments and more. Plus, it’s now easier for Ignite TV users to keep track of all their internet and TV equipment. With login improvements, better password change options, continual bug fixes and a faster way to pay your bill with fewer steps, now you’re one step closer to the things that matter most!

In this latest version we’ve made things easier for everyone including the visually impaired by adding new accessibility elements to help with things like making payments and more. Plus, it’s now easier for Ignite TV users to keep track of all their internet and TV equipment. With login improvements, better password change options, continual bug fixes and a faster way to pay your bill with fewer steps, now you’re one step closer to the things that matter most!

-You can now add Wireless data entirely within our app!

-We updated the wording on the final step before submitting a payment so it’s more clear that a payment is about to be made.

-When signing in, some iOS users experienced an issue where both their username and password were erased when a password was entered incorrectly. This has been fixed!

-We’ve made some fixes that improve the app’s stability.

-You can now add Wireless data entirely within our app!

-We updated the wording on the final step before submitting a payment so it’s more clear that a payment is about to be made.

-When signing in, some iOS users experienced an issue where both their username and password were erased when a password was entered incorrectly. This has been fixed!

-We’ve made some fixes that improve the app’s stability.
Introducing Rogers Infinite™: Unlimited data plans

-You asked, we listened. Say hello to the clear new interface we made to show how much talk, text, and data you have left until your next bill starts.
-If you’ve got a Rogers Infinite plan, you can now purchase a Speed Pass right from within the app so you can keep on enjoying max speed data.
-For our Upfront Edge™ customers, you can now see the Upfront Edge amount.
Our new Rogers Device Toolbox can help you find solutions if you experience issues with your device, and will assist you during a repair claim

You’ll now be able to easily recover your username and reset your password directly from the app.
You can now track your accessories & all your device payments on the new Accessories Dashboard!
You can now view all your device payments and financing details!
Improvement and bug fixes

Sign in to manage Ignite SmartStream
Reset parental control PIN, refresh your Ignite SmartStream box(es) or reset purchase PIN"
Improvement and bug fixes.
